name: borzoi

a tall breed of dog, originally from Russia, with a long, thin, pointed face and long hair: The borzoi is a breed of domestic dog also called the Russian wolfhound. The borzoi would pursue the wolf and hold it until the hunter arrived.
fotojagodka/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThis elegant borzoi is shown leaving the judging ring, calmly and with poise.Most borzoi are almost silent, barking only very rarely. Being built primarily for speed, borzoi do not carry large amounts of body fat or muscle.Hounds that track by sight include greyhounds and borzois.
